title: BRIEF-FDA Grants Orphan Drug Designation For Neuren's NNZ-2591 To Treat Angelman, Phelan-Mcdermid And Pitt Hopkins Syndromes
text:
BRIEF-FDA Grants Orphan Drug Designation For Neuren's NNZ-2591 To Treat Angelman, Phelan-Mcdermid And Pitt Hopkins Syndromes

BRIEF-FDA Grants Orphan Drug Designation For Neuren's NNZ-2591 To Treat Angelman, Phelan-Mcdermid And Pitt Hopkins Syndromes Oct 17 (Reuters) - Neuren Pharmaceuticals Ltd : * FDA GRANTS ORPHAN DRUG DESIGNATION FOR NEUREN'S NNZ-2591 TO TREAT ANGELMAN, PHELAN-MCDERMID AND PITT HOPKINS SYNDROMES
